name: Sprott Physical Silver Trust transferable redeemable units
longDescription: The Sprott Physical Silver Trust PSLV is a closedend trust that invests in unencumbered and fullyallocated London Good Delivery LGD silver bars. Sprott Physical Silver Trust is a closed end mutual fund trust, created to invest and hold substantially all of its assets in physical silver bullion.
fulldescription: The Sprott Physical Silver Trust PSLV is a closedend trust that invests in unencumbered and fullyallocated London Good Delivery LGD silver bars. Sprott Physical Silver Trust is a closed end mutual fund trust, created to invest and hold substantially all of its assets in physical silver bullion.
